app.title: MCPTool - @wrrulos
app.newVersion: %spaces%&a&lNew version available! &f&lClose &f&lMCP&c&lTool &f&land use the command &b&lmcptool update &f&lin the terminal to update.

commands.invalidCommand: %spaces%&cInvalid Command. &f&lUse &ahelp&f&l for see all avaible commands.

ipinfo.error: %spaces%%prefix% &f&lCould not get data from the entered IP. It's possibly invalid.

token.invalidToken: %spaces%%prefix% &f&lInvalid token. Use the command &b&lseeker token &f&lto get a new token.
token.restart: %spaces%%prefix% &f&lPlease, restart the tool and try again.

servers.filterByData: %spaces%%prefix% &f&lDo you want to filter servers by specific data? (&b&ly or n&f&l) &8&l▶ &f&l
servers.filterByCountryCode: %spaces%%prefix% &f&lDo you want to filter servers by country code? (&b&ly or n&f&l) &8&l▶ &f&l
servers.filterByCountryCodeText: %spaces%%prefix% &f&lEnter the country code to filter the servers. &8&l▶ &f&l
servers.filterByCracked: %spaces%%prefix% &f&lDo you want to filter servers by cracked status? (&b&ly or n&f&l) &8&l▶ &f&l
servers.filterByDescription: %spaces%%prefix% &f&lDo you want to filter servers by description? (&b&ly or n&f&l) &8&l▶ &f&l
servers.filterByDescriptionText: %spaces%%prefix% &f&lEnter the description to filter the servers. &8&l▶ &f&l
servers.filterByOnlyBungeespoofable: %spaces%%prefix% &f&lDo you want to filter servers by only bungeespoofable? (&b&ly or n&f&l) &8&l▶ &f&l
servers.filterByProtocol: %spaces%%prefix% &f&lDo you want to filter servers by protocol? (&b&ly or n&f&l) &8&l▶ &f&l
servers.filterByProtocolText: %spaces%%prefix% &f&lEnter the protocol to filter the servers. &8&l▶ &f&l
servers.noServers: %spaces%%prefix% &f&lNo servers found. Try again later or change the filters.

scan.scanning: %spaces%%prefix% &f&lScanning the entered IP address &8&l(&a&l%ip%&8&l) &f&lwith the port range &a&l%portRange% &f&lusing the method &a&l%method%&f&l...
scan.noOpenPorts: %spaces%%prefix% &f&lNo open ports found in the entered IP address.
scan.openPorts: %spaces%%prefix% &a&l%openPorts% &f&lopen ports found in the entered IP address.

kick.kickingPlayer: %spaces%%prefix% &f&lKicking the player %username% from the server %ip% using the version %version%...
kick.playerNotKicked: %spaces%%prefix% &f&lCould not kick the player %username% from the server. Reason: %reason%

kickall.allPlayersKicked: %spaces%%prefix% &f&lAll players kicked successfully from the server.

listening.waitingForConnections: %spaces%%prefix% &f&lListening for connections from the &a&l%ip% &f&lserver. Waiting for connections...

bruteauth.bruteForcing: %spaces%%prefix% &f&lInitiating a brute force attack on the authentication plugin on server &a&l%ip% &f&lwith the user &b&l%username% &f&land the password list &6&l%passwordFile% &f&l(&6&l1000 passwords&f&l).

proxy.velocityForwardingMode: %spaces%%prefix% &f&lWrite the velocity mode you want to use. &8(&a&lnone legacy bungeeguard modern) &8&l▶ &f&l

rcon.commandInput: %spaces%%prefix% &f&lEnter the command you want to execute on the RCON server. &8&l▶ &f&l

brutercon.bruteForcing: %spaces%%prefix% &f&lInitiating a brute force attack on the RCON server on server &a&l%ip% &f&lwith the password list &6&l%passwordFile% &f&l(&6&l%passwords% passwords&f&l).

subdomains.noSubdomains: %spaces%%prefix% &f&lNo subdomains found in the entered domain using the wordlist &a&l%file%&f&l.

sendcmd.sendingCommands: %spaces%%prefix% &f&lSending commands to the server &a&l%ip% &f&lusing the user &b&l%username% &f&land the commands file &6&l%commandsFile% &f&l(&6&l%commands% commands&f&l).

errors.serverOffline: %spaces%%prefix% &f&lCould not get data from the entered server. It's possibly turned off.
errors.invalidServerFormat: %spaces%%prefix% &f&lThe server format entered is not valid. You have to enter &c&lip:port &f&lor &c&ldomain&f&l.
errors.invalidDomain: %spaces%%prefix% &f&lThe domain entered is not valid. Check the domain and try again.
errors.invalidIpFormat: %spaces%%prefix% &f&lThe IP format entered is not valid. You have to enter a valid IP.
errors.invalidIpRange: %spaces%%prefix% &f&lThe IP range entered is not valid. You have to enter a valid IP range.
errors.invalidPortFormat: %spaces%%prefix% &f&lThe port format entered is not valid. You have to enter a valid port.
errors.invalidPortRange: %spaces%%prefix% &f&lThe port range entered is not valid. You have to enter a valid port range.
errors.invalidIpAndPort: %spaces%%prefix% &f&lThe IP and port entered are not valid. You have to enter a valid IP and port.
errors.invalidScanMethod: %spaces%%prefix% &f&lThe scan method entered is not valid. You have to enter %methods%.
errors.invalidEndpoint: %spaces%%prefix% &f&lThe endpoint in the settings file is not valid. Check the settings file and try again.
errors.invalidFile: %spaces%%prefix% &f&lThe file entered is not valid. Check the file and try again.
errors.invalidProxyType: %spaces%%prefix% &f&lThe proxy type entered is not valid. You have to enter &c&lvelocity &f&lor &c&lwaterfall&f&l.
errors.invalidVelocityMode: %spaces%%prefix% &f&lThe velocity mode entered is not valid. You have to enter &c&lnone &f&lor &c&llegacy &f&lor &c&lbungeeguard &f&lor &c&lmodern&f&l.
errors.endpointConnectionError: %spaces%%prefix% &f&lCould not connect to the endpoint. The endpoint is possibly offline.
errors.nmapNotInstalled: %spaces%%prefix% &f&lNmap is not installed. Install it and try again.
errors.masscanNotInstalled: %spaces%%prefix% &f&lMasscan is not installed. Install it and try again.
errors.javaNotInstalled: %spaces%%prefix% &f&lJava is not installed. Install it and try again.
errors.quboJarNotFound: %spaces%%prefix% &f&lThe Qubo jar file was not found. See the logs for more information.
errors.notJavaServer: %spaces%%prefix% &f&lThis command can only be used on Java servers.
errors.subdomainsFileEmpty: %spaces%%prefix% &f&lThe subdomains file is empty. Add subdomains to the file and try again.
errors.passwordFileEmpty: %spaces%%prefix% &f&lThe password file is empty. Add passwords to the file and try again.
errors.proxyPathNotFound: %spaces%%prefix% &f&lThe proxy path entered is not valid. Check the logs and try again.
errors.proxySettingsNotFound: %spaces%%prefix% &f&lThe proxy settings were not found in the settings file. Check the logs and try again.
errors.proxyNotConfigured: %spaces%%prefix% &f&lThe proxy server is not configured. Check the logs and try again.
errors.proxyJarNotFound: %spaces%%prefix% &f&lThe proxy jar file was not found. See the logs for more information.
errors.javaVersionNotSupported: %spaces%%prefix% &f&lThe Java version is not supported. You have to use Java 19 or higher.
errors.invalidJarFile: %spaces%%prefix% &f&lThe jar file entered is not valid. Check the logs for more information.
errors.velocityTomlError: %spaces%%prefix% &f&lThere was an error in the velocity.toml file. Check the logs for more information.
errors.rconTimeout: %spaces%%prefix% &f&lThe RCON server connection timed out. Check the IP and port or the RCON password and try again.
errors.rconConnectionRefused: %spaces%%prefix% &f&lThe RCON server connection was refused. Check the IP and port or the RCON password and try again.
errors.rconInvalidPassword: %spaces%%prefix% &f&lThe RCON password entered is not valid. Check the password and try again.
errors.rconUnknownError: %spaces%%prefix% &f&lAn unknown error occurred while connecting to the RCON server. Check the logs for more information.
errors.commandsFileEmpty: %spaces%%prefix% &f&lThe commands file is empty. Add commands to the file and try again.
